description:
Leaks happen, don’t get deflated. This Sleeping Mat Repair kit will have you floating on air in no time. 3M™ patches are formulated to provide a secure bond to sleeping mat surface fabric.

  • Self-adhesive patches are as easy to use as a band-aid
  • 3M VHB™ adhesive sticks to just about everything, great for other uses besides mat repair
  • Includes: 2 x replacement silicone 1-way valves, 4 x small round patches, 4 x large square patches and instructions
name: Sea To Summit Sleeping Mat Repair Kit
